article_title: Drug Costs Top $50K A Year For Half Million Americans

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: With the drug industry launching more expensive targeted therapies, the number of Americans with annual medication costs of more than $50,000 has jumped more than 60% to nearly 600,000, a new analysis shows. The latest drug spending trend report from pharmacy benefit manager Express Scripts (ESRX) shows 576,000 Americans with annual [...]
